title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the "live" areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.)
OB: The Help view does not allow immediate keyboard navigation without first clicking on one of the "live" areas.
EB: The Help view should allow immediate keyboard navigation without requiring users to first click on any specific area.
SR: Ensure that the Help view is designed to allow immediate keyboard navigation without any additional mouse interactions.
